text: Zvirokwazvo, vakakurambidzai Al-Maitah (nyama yemhuka yafa yoga), ropa, nyama yenguruve, uye nemhuka inouraiwa sechibairo kune zvimwe kunze kwaAllah (kana inouraiwa zita raAllah risina kutaurwa). Asi kana umwe ari panguva yakaoma pasina kuzviitira une kana kupfurikidza mwero, zvirokwazvo Allah vanoregerera zvikuru, vane tsitsi zhinji
